name: Time For Bed
description:
Get Little Jimmy to bed as he tries to run away! 

Move your character with W,A,S,D and rotate with Q,E. Be quick, Jimmy speeds up after every collision! You are the red characters, jimmy is the white character, and the bed is green.

This game was created in under 3 hours for the TriJam #67 game jam (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-67).  All art assets are (obviously) primitive 3D shapes in Unity. 

Music courtesy of http://www.nihilore.com/
